

######################################

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_totalitarian = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		has_ethic = ethic_authoritarian

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_trait_ruler_feedback_loop = yes
    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_ear_to_the_ground = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_divinity_focus = {
    OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}

				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_origin = origin_synthetic_fertility
				}
				AND = {
					has_origin = origin_synthetic_fertility
					has_technology = tech_synthetic_workers
				}
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_courtroom_training = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		is_xenophobe = no
		exists = owner
		owner = { is_homicidal = no }

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intolerant }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intolerant_2 }
}

    has_overlord_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}

					exists = federation
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_robotist = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				has_technology = tech_robotic_workers
				has_cybernetic_ascension = yes
				is_individual_machine = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_shroud_preacher = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		from = {
			NOT = {
				has_origin = origin_mindwardens
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = mindwarden_commander
		}
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_commander_governor
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 8
}

    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			NOR = {
				is_homicidal = yes
				has_valid_civic = civic_inwards_perfection
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intolerant }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intolerant_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_venerated = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_pop_focused_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_pop_focused = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_principled = {
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_commerce_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_commerce_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_naturalist_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_naturalist = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_architectural_interest = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_procrastinator }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_procrastinator_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_defenseprivatization_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_defenseprivatization_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_federal_joint_navy_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_federal_joint_navy = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_assembler = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			OR = {
				is_gestalt = yes
				has_technology = tech_robotic_workers
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_whisper_networks = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_politics_traditions_focus = {
    OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_environmental_engineer = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			has_blocker_removal_tech = yes
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_consumer_goods = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_bureaucraticsurveillance_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_bureaucraticsurveillance_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_homesteader = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_food = yes
		}
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_mutualdefense_focus = {
    OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_forge_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

		has_trait = subclass_official_governor

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 8

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_capitalist = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_eager = {
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_consul_general = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			is_homicidal = no
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor

		OR = {

		}

    leader_class = official

    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_industry_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_pact_keeper = {
    OR = {
			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			NOR = {
				is_homicidal = yes
				has_valid_civic = civic_inwards_perfection
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_industrial_focus = {
    has_paragon_dlc = yes
		has_any_governor_focus = no
		has_governor_subclass = yes
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			country_uses_consumer_goods = yes
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = {
    leader_class = official
    exists = owner
    owner = { has_origin = origin_treasure_hunters }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_trait_ruler_architectural_sense = yes
    leader_class = official
}

			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					exists = federation
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_politician = {
    OR = {
			is_gestalt = no
			AND = {
				is_gestalt = yes
				is_councilor = yes
			}
		}

    leader_class = official
}

    leader_class = official

				has_paragon_dlc = no

			has_paragon_dlc = no
			has_trait = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor
		}
		exists = owner
		owner = {
			NOR = {
				has_valid_civic = civic_fanatic_purifiers
				has_valid_civic = civic_inwards_perfection
				is_gestalt = yes
				is_criminal_syndicate = yes
			}
		}

    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_insider_trading_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_pre_ftl_stances_focus = {
    has_first_contact_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_mutualdefense_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_mutualdefense_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_righteous_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_righteous = yes
    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_corrupt_2 }
}

    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical }

    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_tyrannical_2 }

    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_insider_trading_2 }

}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_commerce_focus = {
    OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_rulesofwar_focus_2 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_rulesofwar_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_resolution_category_defenseprivatization_focus = {
    has_overlord_dlc = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = owner
				owner = {
					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding = yes
    leader_class = official
}

    OR = {
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_governor
			has_trait = subclass_official_governor
		}
		has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_entrepreneur = yes

		has_trait = subclass_official_governor

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_trade_focus = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		has_paragon_dlc = yes
		exists = owner
		owner = { is_gestalt = no }

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_insider_trading }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_insider_trading_2 }

			AND = {
				exists = owner

					is_galactic_community_member = yes
				}
				has_paragon_dlc = no
			}
			has_trait = subclass_official_delegate
		}

    leader_class = official

			has_trait = subclass_official_economy_councilor
			has_trait = subclass_scientist_councilor
		}

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}

		}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_overseer = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4

oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus_3 = {
    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_ambassador_commercial_pact_focus = yes
    has_paragon_dlc = yes

    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_private_mines = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_scrapper_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding = {
    leader_class = official
}


oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_scrapper = {
    trait_is_crisis_faction_check = no
		trait_is_wilderness_check = no
		has_global_flag = game_started
		has_base_skill > 1
		NOT = {
			has_leader_flag = block_homeworld_traits
		}

    leader_class = official
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_capitalist_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_private_mines_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_homesteader_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_entrepreneur_2 }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated }
    NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_venerated_2 }
}

    oxr_mdlc_leader_official_can_add_leader_trait_refinement_focus = yes
    leader_class = official
    has_base_skill >= 4
}
